Test 1
 * has all the required files
   - source dir exists
   - remote dir exists
   - transfer dir exists
   - metadata files exist
     - FILES.csv exists
     - DESCRIPTION.csv exists
 * has all the listed files
  - The files exist on disk
  - file sizes match
  - file hashes match
 * has valid metadata
 * has no unverified files
 * has no unused files
